sentence: WASHINGTON, D.C.— In response to the Senate’s failed effort to move David Weil’s nomination forward, Adam Brandon, FreedomWorks President, commented: “We applaud the 50 Republican Senators and the three Democratic Senators–West Virginia’s Joe Manchin and Arizona’s Kyrsten Sinema and Mark Kelly–who voted against cloture on the nomination of David Weil to be Administrator of the Department of Labor’s Wage and Hour Division.” “Weil’s confirmation to this position would have harmed workers as well as employers, particularly small businesses.
author: Adam Brandon
